home.title: Restart Spine, Rehab
home.subtitle: & Recovery
home.description: Combining advanced manual therapy techniques and rehabilitation strategies to alleviate pain and improve your quality of life.
home.easyBookingDesc: Schedule appointments online 24/7 with our convenient booking system.
home.expertCareDesc: Dr. Gilliany Acevedo, D.C. specializes in therapeutic exercises and personalized care for active populations.
home.safeSecureDesc: Your health information is protected with industry-standard security measures.
home.readyToStartDesc: Book your appointment today and take the first step towards a pain-free life.
home.copyright: © 2024 Restart Spine, Rehab & Recovery. All rights reserved.
home.trustedPartner: Your trusted partner in spine, rehabilitation & recovery. Serving patients in Spanish and English.
home.testimonial1Text: Amazing care! Dr. Acevedo helped me recover from my back injury faster than I expected.
home.testimonial2Text: Professional service and effective treatment. Highly recommend Restart for anyone with chronic pain.
home.testimonial3Text: The booking system is so convenient, and the staff is incredibly friendly and knowledgeable.
home.ctaDescription: Book your appointment today and take the first step towards a pain-free life.
home.footerCopyright: © 2024 Restart Spine, Rehab & Recovery. All rights reserved.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive chiropractic care designed to address your specific needs and help you achieve optimal health and wellness.
services.notSureTitle: Not Sure Which Service You Need?
services.notSureDesc: Book a consultation and let our experts recommend the best treatment plan for you.
services.discoveryCallDesc: Free consultation to discuss your needs and explore treatment options.
services.initialEvaluationDesc: Comprehensive assessment with detailed examination and treatment planning.
services.chiropracticVisitDesc: Focused chiropractic adjustment and manual therapy session.
services.recoveryVisitDesc: Therapeutic recovery session using advanced manual therapy techniques.
services.reliefMovementDesc: Comprehensive rehabilitation session combining therapy and movement exercises.
services.medicalPlanDesc: Medical evaluation designed for insurance-based treatment plans.
